name: @state-adapt/core
description: State management library built with RxJS and inspired by the adapter pattern introduced in NgRx/Entity.
author: Mike Pearson

scripts.bump-version:major: npm version major --force && cd libs/core && npm version major --force
scripts.bump-version:minor: npm version minor --force && cd libs/core && npm version minor --force
scripts.bump-version:patch: npm version patch --force && cd libs/core && npm version patch --force
scripts.build:lib-pack: ng build core && npm run copy-files &&  cd dist/libs/core && npm pack
scripts.commit-git: git commit -m "build: adds new release" && git push origin && git push origin --tags
